籤詩版本二:
Ndinapeza chuma m’maloto anga ndipo ndinadzuka osadziŵa, ndinaganiza kuti Nanshan anali khasu chabe.
Ngati mufunsa za ukwati ndi matenda, musayang'ane njira zothandizirana.
詩意:
Hexagram iyi imayimira chizindikiro cha kupeza chuma m'maloto.
Zonse ndi pachabe.
解曰: Zinthu zili m'madzi. Mawonekedwe ndi kutalika kwa mthunzi. Onse atsimikiza. Palibe chifukwa chokambirana.
籤詩故事一:
◇Ma Chao amathamangitsa Cao
Ma Chao (176-222), dzina laulemu Mengqi, anali mbadwa ya Fufeng Maoling (tsopano kumpoto chakum'mawa kwa Xingping, m'chigawo cha Shaanxi).
Munthawi ya Mafumu Atatu, Cao Cao adapha abambo a Ma Chao. Ma Chao adabwezera ndikuukira Cao Cao, koma Cao Cao adagonjetsedwa ndikuthawa.
Pofuna kuti asadziwike ndi asilikali a Ma Chao, Cao Cao anavula malaya ake ofiira, kudula ndevu zake, ndipo anathawa atakwera pamahatchi.
Panthawi yovuta, Cao Hong anafika ndi asilikali ake panthawi yake, anaimitsa Ma Chao, ndikupulumutsa moyo wa Cao Cao pachipata cha gehena.
(Nkhani iyi ndi fanizo la momwe munthu angapulumukire pangozi mwa kusiya kutchuka ndi udindo wake.)
聖意: Ngati kwanu sikuli bwino samalani kufunafuna ndalama, kulepheretsa malonda, kapena kukwatiwa, chonde pemphererani madalitso kwa oyenda pansi. Kusamuka, mwayi, katundu wotayika, matenda opanda kanthu Pempherani chitetezo kwa Mulungu, mapiri ndi manda sakhala bwino.
第X籤: Gawo la makumi asanu ndi anayi
